java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class OverlapperDiagram
extends Diagram

BiclusVisPanel contains a BiclusVisDiagram and a toolbar with different options to apply to the Diagram

Author:
Rodrigo Santamaria
